notes.text:
This update for liblouis fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-26768: Fixed buffer overflow in lou_logFile() (bsc#1209431).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in Liblouis v.3.24.0 allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via the compileTranslationTable.c and lou_setDataPath functions.
notes.title: CVE description

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
